title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Advanced Mathematics Learning Design Utilizing Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge and applied mathematics experience in professional settings
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners complete pre-learning materials for weekly mathematics topics (statistics, differential equations, etc.) at a rate of 90% or higher using LMS in a flipped learning environment
Learners present and receive feedback on complex mathematical problem-solving strategies at least three times through collaborative activities with peers in real-time video sessions
Learners improve their ability to apply mathematical concepts by 20% compared to pre-flipped learning levels through formative assessments (quizzes, discussion participation, self-evaluation)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
